trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Bossier City
There were no other sightings in Bossier City on or around September 2nd 2009
divs: sighting detailsi saw 4 lights very high in the sky. 3 blue and 1 red. 2 of the blue ones were in the sky for about 5 minutes then disappeared and the red 1 flew in a straight line shortly then disappeared. but the 1 blue light was doing very erratic movements flying fast then slow repeatedly, stopping on a dime, the sudden left the right movements. this one also was in the sky for a good hour 1\2. it started out northwest of barksdale afb then started moving to where it was almost directly above the military base.
